name: coins_list_pairs
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool investing_cryptocurrency_markets.
Tool description: These APIs provide data of all cryptocurrencies, markets, ideal for tracking prices and exchange rates.
API description: Fetches a list of available cryptocurrency pairs from the RapidAPI endpoint.

lang_id.description: The value of all_langs/lang_ID returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint

time_utc_offset.description: UTC offset value in seconds. For example, UTC+8 is represented as 28800. Defaults to 28800.
